description: This is a bearing kit for your full suspension Ghost ASX/Lanao FS/Kato.Kit includes: 4 x ball bearing (688-KRR-2RS) Ø8,0 x Ø16,0 x 7,0mm, 2 x counter sunk bolt M5 x 12,0 mm, 1 x axle Ø8,0 x Ø13,0 x 19,3mm, 1 x axle Ø17,0 x Ø22,5 x 65mm, 1 x counter sunk bolt M8 x 20,0mm, 2 x washer Ø17,1 x Ø23,0 x 2,5mm, 2 x sealing ring Ø23,1 x Ø30 x 2,0mm, 2 x ball bearing (6803-2RS) Ø17,0 x Ø26,0 x 5,0mm, 1 x spacer Ø17,2 x Ø21 x 37,0mm, 2 x special counter sunk bolt M8 x 22.5mm, 2 x bearing cap Ø25 x Ø9 x 5.4mm, 4 x ball bearing (608-2RS) Ø22 x Ø8 x 7mm, 2 x threaded sleeve Ø14x M8xM12 x 9.4mm,1 x axle Ø13 x Ø8 x 92.7mm, 1 x bearing cap Ø25x Ø8 x 4.2mm, 2 x Spacer Ø19x Ø8 x 2.0mm, 1 x bearing cap Ø25x Ø5.5x 4.4mm
name: Ghost ASX/Lanao FS/Kato FS Bearing Kit #KE0144
